page.title: 09Life on the farm nr. Gretton
page.content: Mr.Geoffrey Paul Hunt aged 40 lives with his wife and two sons at 6 Corby Rd.Gretton.He is a farmer and owns about 50 fields covering six hundred acres.On the farm there are about two hundred breeding ewes,five rams and one hundred and sixty cattle including bullocks.There are 5 sheds where live- stock are kept.In a year he grows wheat winter rape,which is an oil seed,winter oats,winter barley and tic beans.Staff on the farm are the two brothers and a man who works there regularly.Machinery consists of five tractors,a drill,com- bine harvester,two corn trailers,potato harvester,corn drier and various tools for the tractor.The rabbit population comes and goes with myxomatosis.There are deer,badgers,foxes and pheasants in the woods.Mr.Hunt uses Kettering market for buying and selling his stock.
